escalate: ESC expired codes/discount code issues, ask for cart ID and add it in esc notes
Don't send to CS for this client, ESC if needed
For retroactive discount requests add discount % in ESC note
ESC if a customer requests a different resolution, after their escalation was resolved
dos_and_donts: Fun Bucks AREN'T rewards points, those are given during exchanges
promo_and_exclusions: This brand does not use coupon codes or promotions. All of their discounts are exclusively link-based and are applied automatically to the shopping cart upon checkout when the appropriate conditions are met
Please do not advise customers to use promotional codes, do not provide them with any codes, and do not direct them to look on the website for additional codes
They do not have any promotional code text fields on site to facilitate use

Looking into the Leptin resistance supplement.  Don't know what my Leptin value is... how do I know if I'm Leptin resistant? I need to lose 50lbs
VoC: Looking into the Leptin resistance supplement. Don't know what my Leptin value is... how do I know if I'm Leptin resistant? I need to lose 50lbs

My Leptin level was done two years ago and it was "15"
Dr. Westin Childs: I understand! Thank you for letting me know. Is there anything else that I can help with while I wait for a response from the team?
Does Dr Child's do virtual appointments? So impressed with his knowledge and stories of his patients successes!

Dr. Westin Childs: Thank you for your interest in Dr. Childs, he indeed has helped many patients! Regarding virtual appointments, I would have to bring that forward as well to my team. I will get back to you with updates. Please hang tight!

Did you have any questions I could help with?
-Sarah
 https://plankmattress.attn.tv/afgr49Czq47G
Yes, I'm requesting the delivery be between March. Second, and march fifth, as I will not be available before then.Is that okay

Plank Mattress: I understand your concern! All products shipped from our manufacturing facility are delivered via national carrier, typically FedEx. Once a shipping label is created and products leave our facility, the final delivery date is at the discretion of the carrier. While we cannot guarantee that a product shipment will arrive on a customer's preferred date, we can delay a shipment to ensure it arrives after a specified date. Please feel free to reach out to our customer service team at 1-888-210-8751 so that we can best accommodate any special requests.
So could you please do that?Delay the shipment

Plank Mattress: Absolutely! We can help with that. While we can't guarantee delivery on a specific preferred date, we can delay your shipment to ensure it arrives after the date you specify. Please reach out to our customer service team at 1-888-210-8751 with the details, and we'll make sure your request is accommodated. Let me know if there's anything else I can help you with.
